android.gameengine.icadroids.alarms

Class Alarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.gameengine.icadroids.alarms.Alarm

  • public class Alarm
extends Object
    Set alarms who will trigger after a specified number of updates. Alarms will trigger a method (specified in IAlarm) after the given time in the specified object. To make use of alarms, create a alarm object. This alarm will start immediately.
    Author:
    Bas van der Zandt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alarm(int id, int Time, IAlarm alarmedObject)
      Make a new Alarm with the given time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pauseAlarm()
      Pause the alarm until you start it again with startAlarm()
      void restartAlarm()
      Restart the alarm
      void setTime(int time)
      Change the time of the alarm
      void startAlarm()
      Starts the alarm when it has paused
      void update()
      Update will be triggered by the GameEngine every update.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Alarm

        public Alarm(int id,
     int Time,
     IAlarm alarmedObject)
        Make a new Alarm with the given time. The alarm will start immediately.
        Parameters:
        id - ID to identify the alarm
        Time - How many updates must occur before the alarm goes off
        alarmedObject - The object that must be informed when the alarm goes off

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public final void update()
        Update will be triggered by the GameEngine every update. Don't call this update by yourself! Update handles the alarm to be triggered an deleted.

      • pauseAlarm

        public final void pauseAlarm()
        Pause the alarm until you start it again with startAlarm()

      • startAlarm

        public final void startAlarm()
        Starts the alarm when it has paused

      • restartAlarm

        public final void restartAlarm()
        Restart the alarm

      • setTime

        public final void setTime(int time)
        Change the time of the alarm
        Parameters:
        time - The time
